titleStmt.title: The pilgrime of Casteele
Peregrino en su patria. English. Abridgements
titleStmt.author: Vega, Lope de, 1562-1635.
Dutton, William, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by [E. Allde for] John Norton,

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Vega, Lope de. El peregrino en su patria.
In the Worcester College (University of Oxford). Library copy of STC 24630.5, the translation is ascribed in contemporary MS. to William Dutton.--Cf. STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
